alert.note: Alert for Parker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 4:59PM CST until March 02 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Parker County in north central Texas... * Until 600 PM CST. * At 459 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cool, or over Mineral Wells, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Mineral Wells, Azle, Briar, Willow Park, Reno, Aledo, Springtown, Brock, Hudson Oaks, Western Lake, Annetta, Poolville, Cool, Lake Mineral Wells, Lake Weatherford, Annetta South, Annetta North, Millsap and Sanctuary. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
